snippet.title: Flutter Getting Started: Can You Build iOS Android Apps with One Language?
snippet.description:
It's been very interesting using Flutter these past couple of weeks. I think its really growing on me how easy it is to setup an application using Dart.  In today's video, let's go over what it looks like to develop a simple list application and check out what Dart code looks like.

Installing Flutter SDK: https://flutter.io/get-started/install/
VS Code: https://code.visualstudio.com/
Configure Dart Plugin: https://flutter.io/get-started/editor/#vscode

Podcasts Course
https://www.letsbuildthatapp.com/course/Podcasts

Intermediate Training Core Data
https://www.letsbuildthatapp.com/course/intermediate-training-core-data

Instagram Firebase Course
https://www.letsbuildthatapp.com/course/instagram-firebase

Facebook Group
https://www.facebook.com/groups/1240636442694543/

Completed Source Code
https://www.letsbuildthatapp.com/course_video?id=2992

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/buildthatapp/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/buildthatapp
